All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Actor
Parent class of all the game objects in com.game.background except Background and BackgroundImage.
Background
This class renders all the objects during the game including Score and Music objects.
BackgroundImage
Sets the background image.
DeathController
Checks and handles Frogger's death.
Digit
Renders the digit images which reflects the player's score.
End
Renders the end point's images that will hold Frogger when it reaches.
EndMessageController
Controller class for EndMessage.fxml.
EndMessageView
View class for EndMessage.fxml.
Frogger
Handles and reflects player's input.
FroggerProperties
Initialises Frogger's properties.
FroggerTest
To test Frogger class.
Highscore
Reads and writes new highscores into their respective files.
HighscoreTest
To test Highscore class.
Level
Renders specific level's background objects.
Log
Renders movable log images in the game.
Main
Launches the application.
MenuController
Controller class for Menu.fxml.
MenuView
View class for Menu.fxml.
MovementController
Controls the Frogger's movement according to the player's input.
Music
Loads, plays and stops music.
MyStage
Empty class used to store all the game objects.
PopUpHighscore
Renders the Pop-up Highscore window.
PopUpInstructionsController
Controller class for PopUpInstructions.fxml.
PopUpInstructionsView
View class for PopUpInstructions.fxml.
ProceedNextLevelController
Controller class for ProceedNextLevel.fxml.
ProceedNextLevelView
View class for ProceedNextLevel.fxml.
Score
Ensures real time score update during the game.
Turtle
Initialises turtle's properties.
TurtleA
Renders movable turtle images in the game.
TurtleB
Renders movable turtle images in the game.
Vehicle
Renders movable vehicle images in the game.
World
Parent class of Background.
